data.title: Eerste Divisie table, schedule & stats
data.meta_description: Check here Eerste Divisie results, fixtures, table and all relevant stats, from this season and all previous seasons.
data.text:
Eerste Divisie is a professional football league in Netherlands.

There are overall 20 teams that compete for the title every year.

The current holder of the title is Willem II Tilburg and the team that holds the most titles is FC Volendam.

Sofascore tracks live football scores and Eerste Divisie table, results, statistics and top scorers.

The teams are placed in 3 tables, with a promotion and relegation system for the best and worst-performing teams. 0 teams are relegated to the Tweede Divisie.

The top scorers in the last season of Eerste Divisie Eerste Divisie 23/24 season were Thijs Dallinga.Last season top scorer is Thijs Dallinga with 32 goals.

The average attendance per game was 3624.

The total attendance in Eerste Divisie 23/24 season was 1058369.

The largest TV partners for Eerste Divisie are ESPN+, Veronica TV.

The team with the largest stadium is Roda JC Kerkrade with the capacity of 19979.

Which team in Eerste Divisie has the most titles?

The team with the most titles in Eerste Divisie is FC Volendam.

Who won the first Eerste Divisie?

ADO / Blauw Wit won the first Eerste Divisie.

Which team is the current titleholder in Eerste Divisie?

The current titleholder in Eerste Divisie is Willem II Tilburg.

What rank of competition is Eerste Divisie in Netherlands?

Eerste Divisie is professional division in Netherlands.

How many goals are scored on average in Eerste Divisie in Eerste Divisie 24/25?

The average number of goals in Eerste Divisie is 3.05.

When does the Eerste Divisie start and when does it finish?

The Eerste Divisie usually starts in August and ends in May.

How many groups are there in Eerste Divisie competition?

The teams in Eerste Divisie are placed in 3 groups.
